00028 namespace Utilities.Web.Email.MIME
00029 {
00033     public class MIMEBody
00034     {
00035         #region Constructor
00036

00038 
00039         public MIMEBody()
00040         {
00041         }
00042 
00048         public MIMEBody(string Input,MIMEHeader Header)
00049         {
00050             if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(Input))
00051             {
00052                 throw new ArgumentNullException("Input can not be null");
00053             }
00054             MediaEnum ContentType;
00055             ContentType=GetMediaType(Header);
00056             if(MediaEnum.MEDIA_MULTIPART==ContentType)
00057             {
00058                 string CurrentBoundry=GetBoundryMarker(Header);
00059                 if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(CurrentBoundry))
00060                     return;
00061                 CurrentBoundry = CurrentBoundry.Replace("\"", "");
00062                 
00063                 string BoundryStart = "--"+CurrentBoundry;
00064                 string BoundryEnd = BoundryStart+"--";
00065 
00066                 int StartIndex = Input.IndexOf(BoundryStart, 0);
00067                 if (StartIndex == -1) return;
00068                 int EndIndex = Input.IndexOf(BoundryEnd, 0);
00069                 if (EndIndex == -1) EndIndex = Input.Length;
00070 
00071                 Content = Input.Substring(0, StartIndex);
00072                 while (StartIndex < EndIndex)
00073                 {
00074                     StartIndex += BoundryStart.Length + 2;
00075                     if (StartIndex >= EndIndex)
00076                         break;
00077                     int TempIndex = Input.IndexOf(BoundryStart, StartIndex);
00078                     if (TempIndex != -1)
00079                     {
00080                         Boundries.Add(new MIMEMessage(Input.Substring(StartIndex, TempIndex - StartIndex)));
00081                     }
00082                     else
00083                         break;
00084                     StartIndex = TempIndex;
00085                 }
00086             }
00087             else
00088             {
00089                 Content = Input;
00090             }
00091             string Encoding = "";
00092             try
00093             {
00094                 Encoding = Header[Constants.TransferEncoding].Attributes[0].Value;
00095             }
00096             catch
00097             {
00098                 Encoding = Constants.Encoding7Bit;
00099             }
00100             Code CodeUsing = CodeManager.Instance[Encoding];
00101             CodeUsing.CharacterSet = Header[Constants.ContentType][Constants.Charset];
00102             CodeUsing.Decode(Content, out _Content);
00103         }
00104         #endregion
00105 
00106         #region Private Functions
00107 
00108 
00109 
00110 
00111 
00112         private MediaEnum GetMediaType(MIMEHeader Header)
00113         {
00114             string ContentType = GetContentType(Header);
00115             int x=0;
00116             foreach (string TempType in MIMEType.TypeTable)
00117             {
00118                 if (TempType.Equals(ContentType, StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
00119                 {
00120                     return (MediaEnum)x;
00121                 }
00122                 ++x;
00123             }
00124             return (MediaEnum)MIMEType.TypeTable.Length - 1;
00125         }
00126 
00132         private string GetContentType(MIMEHeader Header)
00133         {
00134             if (Header != null && Header[Constants.ContentType] != null && Header[Constants.ContentType].Attributes.Count > 0)
00135             {
00136                 string ContentType = Header[Constants.ContentType].Attributes[0].Value;
00137                 if (null != ContentType)
00138                 {
00139                     int Index = ContentType.IndexOf('/', 0);
00140                     if (Index != -1)
00141                     {
00142                         return ContentType.Substring(0, Index);
00143                     }
00144                     else
00145                     {
00146                         return ContentType;
00147                     }
00148                 }
00149             }
00150             return "text";
00151         }
00152 
00158         private string GetBoundryMarker(MIMEHeader Header)
00159         {
00160             return Header[Constants.ContentType][Constants.Boundary];
00161         }
00162         #endregion
00163

00168         public List<MIMEMessage> Boundries
00169         {
00170             get { return _Boundries; }
00171             set { _Boundries = value; }
00172         }
00173         private List<MIMEMessage> _Boundries = new List<MIMEMessage>();
00174 
00178         public string Content
00179         {
00180             get { return _Content; }
00181             set { _Content = value; }
00182         }
00183         private string _Content = "";
00184         #endregion
